|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = <!-- Size of RAM --> |ram1chip = EtronTech;; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->

|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 11/09/2006 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China

|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = PESI WM233L |rad1modif = Mini PCI |rad1chip1 = Ralink;RT2561; |rad1chip2 = Ralink;RT2527; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The device is marketed towards usage in hotels as an in-room access point.
"WL-APE06-03" is silkscreened on the main board in the FCC photos. :"WM233L" and "41713-84104-B" is silkscreened on the wireless module.. indicating it is (likely) a '''PESI''' WM233L. A MAC label affixed to the card in the internal photos has an 00:0E:8E ('''SparkLAN''') OUI.
The CPU used is presumed to be a S3C2510A. The two 10/100 PHYs appear to be IP101As..
The default SSID may be '''wireless''' (.. it is the value in the rather generic FCC ''manual'') or '''deskpoint''' (used by the v2).
[[Category:English Documentation]]
